text: The Met Gala is one of the biggest parties of the year. And with celebs from all walks of life getting glammed up for the annual affair, there are bound to be some interesting encounters. In the past, there's been such random rendezvous as Nicki Minaj and the Olsen twins. Or, when Nicki gave some major side eye to Demi Lovato.
